desc: Inspired by the leatherworkers in our community, we combine new and old techniques to provide quality, custom products that are as unique as your brand. We take pride in stitching each patch onto your chosen product using thick saddle thread for our signature, custom look.

layout.text: Hand Crafted Leather Patch Hats Customized to You
Upload your design and customize your favorite clothing item
As many styles as you want!
